remarks: Value of the least upper bound function of a poset.  Out-of-domain arguments (those not satisfying ` S e. dom U ` ) are allowed for convenience, evaluating to the empty set.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubval.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) ) $.
lubval.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubval.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
lubval $p |- ( ph -> ( U ` S ) = ( iota_ x e. B ps ) ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
